Hi,

Sorry for asking some simple questions, but I can't find the answers
a=
nywhere. If there are answers posted somewhere (i.e. a Wiki) please
direct =
me there, but the Wiki on the Heritrix website didn't seem to
provide the a=
nswers I'm looking for.

1) How can you control the page request speed of H=
eritrix. I performed
one crawl that was requesting HTML pages from a server=
 at 1.1 page per
second. Which I think is to heavy a load on a web server.
=

2) I see in the finished crawler report stats on images (JPG, GIF,
etc. et=
c). Is Heritrix downloading images while it's crawling, and if
so how do I =
disable that.

3) I'm interested in archiving HTML that links to text files=
 of the
extension ".ms". How can I generate a report of HTML pages that
con=
tain those links? I also want to archive those .MS files.

4) Does anyone h=
ave Heritrix running on a network with multiple
machines working on the sam=
e crawl job. Is this even possible?
